fields.title: IOM Libya Emergency Tracking - Sudan Situation: Update 1 (3 May 2023)
fields.body: This report provides an overview of related arrivals to Libya following the onset of armed clashes in Sudan in mid-April 2023. This brief is based on information gathered through IOM Libya emergency tracking and flow monitoring activities in Al Kufra between 15 April and 2 May 2023. As of 03 May, IOM Libya’s Displacement Tracking Matrix (DTM) recorded the arrival of close to 700 individuals - both Sudanese and third-country nationals - in Alkufra (Libya) from Sudan and via Chad.
fields.body-html: This report provides an overview of related arrivals to Libya following the onset of armed clashes in Sudan in mid-April 2023. This brief is based on information gathered through IOM Libya emergency tracking and flow monitoring activities in Al Kufra between 15 April and 2 May 2023. As of 03 May, IOM Libya’s Displacement Tracking Matrix (DTM) recorded the arrival of close to 700 individuals - both Sudanese and third-country nationals - in Alkufra (Libya) from Sudan and via Chad.

text:
# IOM Libya Emergency Tracking - Sudan Situation: Update 1 (3 May 2023)

This report provides an overview of related arrivals to Libya following the onset of armed clashes in Sudan in mid-April 2023. This brief is based on information gathered through IOM Libya emergency tracking and flow monitoring activities in Al Kufra between 15 April and 2 May 2023. As of 03 May, IOM Libya’s Displacement Tracking Matrix (DTM) recorded the arrival of close to 700 individuals - both Sudanese and third-country nationals - in Alkufra (Libya) from Sudan and via Chad.
summary: IOM Libya's Displacement Tracking Matrix (DTM) recorded the arrival of close to 700 individuals - both Sudanese and third-country nationals - in Alkufra (Libya) from Sudan and via Chad between 15 April and 2 May 2023, following the onset of armed clashes in Sudan in mid-April.
